Field Label: Record ID

Instructions: These are statements that many people have used to describe their voices and the effects of their voices on their lives. Check the response that indicates how frequently you have the same experience.

Field Label:
SCORING:

The score is the sum of the numerals in the multiple-choice responses.

Physical Subscale: questions 2, 4, 10, 13, 14, 17, 18, 20, 21, 26
Emotional Subscale: questions 7, 9, 15, 23, 24, 25, 27, 28, 29, 30
Functional Subscale: questions 1, 3, 5, 6, 8, 11, 12, 16, 19, 22

SCALE:
Functional: Mild >10, Moderate >12, Severe >18
Physical: Mild >15, Moderate >18, Severe >22
Emotional: Mild >8, Moderate >13, Severe >20

Total: Mild >33, Moderate >44, Severe >61
